tooltip: Select Navi as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Navi focuses on scouting and gathering information.
Allows you to summon Navi, a tiny hero that can be attached to other units and Heroes.
Line of Sight of all units is increased by 25%.
Fairy Droves can detect Stealthed units at close range.
Kyandokyan Line of Sight is increased.
